    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Angles Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre ángulos</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Uillinneacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu d'Angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Ângulos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Angoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων γωνιών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The child will test his/her knowledge of basic geometric terms in relation to angles.</string>
            <string language="es">El niño comprobará su conocimiento sobre los términos de geometría básica relacionándolos con los ángulos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh an leanbh a c(h)uid eolais faoi théarmaí bunúsacha geoiméadracha maidir le huillinneacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kind prüft seins/ihr Wissen der grundlegenden
geometrischen Bezeichnungen in Beziehung zu Winkeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enfant testera sa connaissance des limites 
géométriques de base par rapport aux angles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A criança testará his/her conhecimento de termos
geométricos básicos com relação aos ângulos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bambino verificherà la sua conoscenza dei 
termini geometrici di base rispetto agli angoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιδί θα εξετάσει τη γνώση βασικών γεωμετρικών 
όρων του/της σε σχέση με τις γωνίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
